column4: help! does unix style copy paste work in OOo for you, like middle click to paste, select to copy, it won't work here, how do I turn it on?
OOo doesn't have 'serif' and other system fonts listed in the dropdown
looks like it lacks integration with the system
Ctrl + C / Ctrl + P works fine.

I want the mouse (middleclicky) paste to work, use it a lot in emacs, terminal, firefox, ... want to turn it on in the word processor as well, very annoying when I middle click, find it fail, look around, and find out that this is because it's OOo
it pastes from other apps to OOo, but no copying from OOo to anywhere, nomatter what block of text I select in OOo
oh, please look into your fonts dropdown, are 'serif' and 'monospace' and other system fonts listed?
On the toolbar -- but you can type in "Monospace" and it'll change.
see, it works for coz_ though
I could sworn it didn't work -- but yeah, highlighting (and no CTRL+C) register it and bought it to geany.
coz_, troubleshoot me, what info should I give you, how do I make it work here...
I don't know. :|   Try reinstall the package?
